People the voters and that is creating

gotten richer and yet they have not and
they don't understand why and they're
looking for answers and so that does
create an audience for somebody who
offers destructive and irresponsible
answers one of the things I deeply
believe the way politics Works um is
that it's the job of of the voters to
inform the people who would like to be
their leaders what their problems are
and it is then the job of the people who
want like to be the leaders to compete
to come up with responsible solutions to
those problems and I have enough
confidence in the way the system works
to believe that the better ideas tend
over time to win out and the bad ideas
to lose out but there's always a
Temptation uh for um people to try to
see whether they can win an easy or an
immediate Victory by offering something
that sounds plausible but won't work and
so you always have the Ross peros and
the ls um the snake snake oil salesmen
